sense.def:
The extent of something
je dolžina, razsežnost ali velikost nečesa.

seg.quote: ...to expand the empire to its largest extent.

sense.def:
The extent of a situation or difficulty
je velikost ali stopnja nekega položaja ali težave.

seg.quote: The full extent of the problem is not yet known.

sense.def:
Z izrazi, kot so
to a large extent
,
to some extent
ali
to a certain extent
, povemo, da je nekaj delno, ne pa v celoti res.

cit.quote: v veliki meri, do neke mere, do določene mere

seg.quote: Well I think to a certain extent it's true.

sense.def:
Izraze, kot so
to what extent
,
to that extent
ali
to the extent that
, uporabimo, kadar govorimo o tem, kako resnična je neka trditev.

seg.quote: To what extent are diseases linked with genes?
A computer is intelligent only to the extent that it can store information.

sense.def:
Z izrazi, kot sta
to the extent of
ali
to such an extent that
, povemo, da so razmere dosegle določeno stopnjo razvoja.

seg.quote: Sanitary conditions had deteriorated to such an extent that there was widespread danger of disease.
